SDG[0].comment: Fineract enables financial services for billions of unbanked and underbanked individuals worldwide.

SDG[2].comment: Apache Fineract can be deployed in any environment, whether Cloud or on-premise, on- or offline, on mobile or PC. It is extensible enough to support any organizational type or delivery channel, and flexible enough to support any product, service, or methodology.

clearOwnership.comment: I find https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/FINERACT/FINERACT to be more relevant. It contains all specifications, features, reports and contribution guide.
